Articles.Content:
So after looking through the archives here and finding next to no discussion of the changes that Unity 5 KSP 1.1 caused I thought I would create this thread.

  1. First change. The form factor radii appear to all have changed, F0 = 0.25, F1 = 0.5, F2 = 1, F3 = 1.5
  2. Second change. How you import your part tools has changed. Note: like with PT 0.23 I simply created an empty template with part tools and copy it for each new part.
  3. Third change of course we are using part tools 11-2
  4. Forth change is there are a whole bunch of new assets that I'm not to sure how to use.

Before installing the New Unity I tried to mod an old part with my old Unity today and it gave me a version warning, not sure why, so now I am unable access my old project.

There are links for pretty much all of that already.
Try searching the forum. (sorry on phone so too lazy to search, cut and paste on my phone).

On 26.8.2016 at 2:48 AM, PB666 said:

The form factor radii appear to all have changed, F0 = 0.25, F1 = 0.5, F2 = 1, F3 = 1.5

hi, please explain this better, What do you mean "form factor radii"  -  i would be grateful.

thnx in advance !

Edited October 15, 2016 by RaendyLeBeau
